mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT * FROM XTB_ODINFOXM A /*주문정보 마스터*/ )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.ORDER_NUM /*주문번호*/ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.ORDER_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') AS ORDER_DATE /*주문일자*/ , A.COM_NAME /*업체명*/ , A.BIZR_NUM /*사업자등록번호*/ , A.CEO_NAME /*회원ID명(주문자)*/ , A.STAFF_NAME /*담당자 명*/ , A.STAFF_CPON /*담당자 전화번호*/ , A.ORDER_AMT /*주문금액*/ , A.ORDER_CON /*주문상태*/ , POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(A.ORDER_CON) AS ORDER_CON_NM /*주문상태 명*/ , A.ARRIVAL_DATE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM XTB_ODINFOXM B WHERE B.ORDER_NUM = A.ORDER_NUM) ORDER_CNT FROM XTB_ODINFOXM A /*주문정보 마스터*/ )
ORDER BY ORDER_DATE desc
ORDER BY ORDER_DATE asc
ORDER BY COM_NAME desc
ORDER BY COM_NAME asc
ORDER BY ORDER_NUM desc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.ORDER_NUM /*주문번호*/ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.ORDER_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') AS ORDER_DATE /*주문일자*/ , A.COM_NAME /*업체명*/ , A.BIZR_NUM /*사업자등록번호*/ , A.CEO_NAME /*회원ID명(주문자)*/ , A.STAFF_NAME /*담당자 명*/ , A.STAFF_CPON /*담당자 전화번호*/ , A.STAFF_MAIL /*담당자 이메일*/ , A.POST_NUM , A.BASC_ADDR , A.DTL_ADDR , A.ORDER_MSG , A.ORDER_AMT /*주문금액*/ , A.ORDER_CON /*주문상태*/ , POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(A.ORDER_CON) AS ORDER_CON_NM /*주문상태 명*/ , POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(A.PAY_METD) AS PAY_METD_NM /*결제수단 명*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(PDT.TAX_GUBN) FROM POLARBEAR.TB_PDINFOXM PDT WHERE PDT.PD_CODE = B.PD_CODE) AS TAX_GUBN_NM /*면세과세구분 명*/ , A.ARRIVAL_DATE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM XTB_ODINFOXM CC WHERE CC.ORDER_NUM = A.ORDER_NUM) ORDER_CNT , B.ORDER_DTNUM , B.PD_CODE , B.PD_NAME , B.PD_PRICE , CASE WHEN B.PDDC_GUBN = 'PDDC_GUBN_02' THEN B.PD_PRICE - B.PDDC_VAL WHEN B.PDDC_GUBN = 'PDDC_GUBN_03' THEN B.PD_PRICE - (B.PD_PRICE* B.PDDC_VAL/100) ELSE B.PD_PRICE END REAL_PRICE , B.PDDC_GUBN , B.PDDC_VAL , B.ORDER_QTY , B.ORDER_AMT D_ORDER_AMT , B.PAY_METD , B.DLVY_CON , B.DLVY_TDN , B.DLVY_ROWNUM , CASE WHEN B.DLVY_ROWNUM = 'base' THEN '기본배송' WHEN B.DLVY_ROWNUM = 'etc' THEN '개별배송' ELSE C.DLVY_NAME END DLVY_NAME , CASE WHEN B.DLVY_ROWNUM = 'base' THEN A.STAFF_NAME WHEN B.DLVY_ROWNUM = 'etc' THEN '' ELSE C.STAFF_NAME END D_STAFF_NAME , CASE WHEN B.DLVY_ROWNUM = 'base' THEN A.STAFF_CPON WHEN B.DLVY_ROWNUM = 'etc' THEN '' ELSE C.STAFF_CPON END D_STAFF_CPON , CASE WHEN B.DLVY_ROWNUM = 'base' THEN '(' || A.POST_NUM || ')' || ' ' || A.BASC_ADDR || ' ' || A.DTL_ADDR WHEN B.DLVY_ROWNUM = 'etc' THEN '' ELSE '(' || C.POST_NUM || ')' || ' ' || C.BASC_ADDR || ' ' || C.DTL_ADDR END DLVY_ADDR , C.POST_NUM D_POST_NUM , C.BASC_ADDR D_BASC_ADDR , C.DTL_ADDR D_DTL_ADDR FROM XTB_ODINFOXM A, (SELECT * FROM XTB_ODINFOXD WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' ) B, (SELECT * FROM XTB_ODDLAIXM WHERE DEL_YN = 'N' ) C WHERE A.ORDER_NUM = B.ORDER_NUM AND B.ORDER_NUM = C.ORDER_NUM(+) AND B.DLVY_ROWNUM = C.DLVY_ROWNUM(+) )
ORDER BY ORDER_DATE desc
ORDER BY ORDER_DATE asc
ORDER BY COM_NAME desc
ORDER BY COM_NAME asc
ORDER BY ORDER_NUM desc, ORDER_DTNUM desc

SELECT ORDER_NUM /*주문번호*/ , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(ORDER_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd'),'yyyy-MM-dd') AS ORDER_DATE , ORDER_PW , ORDER_AMT , ORDER_CON , PAY_METD , COM_NAME , BIZR_NUM , CEO_NAME , COM_TEL , POST_NUM , BASC_ADDR , DTL_ADDR , EXTRA_ADDR , STAFF_NAME , STAFF_MAIL , STAFF_CPON , ORDER_MSG , ARRIVAL_DATE , ATFL_ID , DLVY_ATFL , CARD_ATFL FROM XTB_ODINFOXM /*주문정보 마스터*/ WHERE ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM}

SELECT A.ORDER_DTNUM /*주문상세번호*/ , A.ORDER_NUM , A.PD_CODE , A.PD_NAME , A.PD_PRICE , CASE WHEN A.PDDC_GUBN = 'PDDC_GUBN_02' THEN A.PD_PRICE - A.PDDC_VAL WHEN A.PDDC_GUBN = 'PDDC_GUBN_03' THEN A.PD_PRICE - (A.PD_PRICE* A.PDDC_VAL/100) ELSE A.PD_PRICE END REAL_PRICE , A.PDDC_GUBN , A.PDDC_VAL , A.ORDER_QTY , A.ORDER_AMT , A.ORDER_CON , A.PAY_METD , A.DLVY_CON , A.DLVY_TDN , A.DLVY_ROWNUM , (SELECT DLVY_NAME FROM XTB_ODDLAIXM B WHERE B.DEL_YN = 'N' AND B.ORDER_NUM = A.ORDER_NUM AND B.DLVY_ROWNUM = A.DLVY_ROWNUM) DLVY_NAME FROM XTB_ODINFOXD A /*주문정보 상세*/ WHERE A.ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.ORDER_DTNUM

SELECT A.ORDER_NUM /*주문번호*/ , A.DLVY_ROWNUM , A.DLVY_NAME , A.STAFF_NAME , A.STAFF_CPON , A.POST_NUM , A.BASC_ADDR , A.DTL_ADDR , A.DLVY_MSG FROM XTB_ODDLAIXM A /*주문배송지정보 */ WHERE A.ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE XTB_ODDLAIXM SET DLAR_GUBN = #{DLAR_GUBN} /*배송지구분*/ , RECV_PERS = #{RECV_PERS} /*수령인*/ , POST_NUM = #{POST_NUM} /*우편번호*/ , BASC_ADDR = #{BASC_ADDR} /*기본주소*/ , DTL_ADDR = #{DTL_ADDR} /*상세주소*/ , RECV_TELN = #{RECV_TELN} /*수령인 전화번호*/ , RECV_CPON = #{RECV_CPON} /*수령인 휴대전화*/ , DLVY_MSG = #{DLVY_MSG} /*배송메세지*/ , MODP_ID = #{REGP_ID} , MOD_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM}
